blueprint.description: Installs Azure CLI on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: The [Azure CLI](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cli/azure/) is a set of commands used to create and manage Azure resources. The Azure CLI is available across Azure services and is designed to get you working quickly with Azure, with an emphasis on automation. It is the official CLI, released by Microsoft.
blueprint.name: Azure CLI
blueprint.title: Azure CLI
